actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-328.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2061) to restructure the Federal Law Enforcement Assistance Administration, to assist State and local governments in improving the quality of their justice systems, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2061 (Justice systems).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2061) to restructure the Federal Law Enforcement Assistance Administration, to assist State and local governments in improving the quality of their justice systems, and for other purposes.
